name: They Are Not Real
description:
You are a patient at a research and treatment facility suffering from a rare sleeplessness-induced schizophrenia. Fight the monsters created by your own brain to get a bit of shut-eye.

Controls (keyboard):

Pause - Esc

Quit - Hold esc for three seconds

Movement - A/D to move left/right; space to jump

Toggle Recipe - Left shift

Interact - W

Shoot - Left click

Reload - Right click

Controls (controller):

Pause - Start

Quit - Hold start for three seconds

Movement - Left stick to move left/right; south button to jump

Toggle Recipe - East button

Interact - Right bumper

Shoot - West button

Reload - North button
